vendors.name: Furaat
vendors.description: Leading water treatment and recycling solutions provider specializing in industrial wastewater management. Offers advanced membrane technologies and IoT-enabled monitoring systems.

vendors.name: Plastic Fischer
vendors.description: Innovative plastic waste collection and recycling company using AI-powered sorting and blockchain tracking. Focuses on ocean plastic prevention and circular economy solutions.

vendors.description: Biofuel additives and alternative energy solutions for industrial applications. Specializes in bio-based fuel enhancement and renewable energy integration for heavy industries.

vendors.description: Solar power company delivering rooftop, utility-scale, and hybrid renewable energy systems. Known for its efficient PV panel installations and smart grid integration.

vendors.name: Kishan Infrastructure
vendors.description: Sustainable infrastructure company focused on green building materials, eco-friendly construction, and urban development aligned with ESG standards.

vendors.name: Apollo Power Systems
vendors.description: Provider of clean energy and power backup solutions, offering solar-diesel hybrid systems, microgrids, and battery storage for industrial applications.

vendors.name: Radiance Energy
vendors.description: Developer of renewable energy projects focusing on solar, wind, and energy storage. Provides tailored clean energy solutions for businesses and institutions.

vendors.name: Advent Envirotech
vendors.description: Environmental technology firm specializing in hazardous waste management, e-waste recycling, and sustainable disposal solutions.

vendors.name: Digital Paani
vendors.description: Smart water management startup offering IoT-enabled monitoring and AI analytics for water conservation in urban and industrial setups.

vendors.name: Earth Sync
vendors.description: Climate intelligence and sustainability analytics firm providing real-time environmental monitoring and carbon footprint tracking tools.

vendors.name: Snowkap
vendors.description: Supply chain sustainability and emissions tracking platform. Provides carbon accounting, compliance management, and ESG reporting support.

vendors.name: Breathe ESG
vendors.description: ESG data analytics and reporting platform enabling companies to manage sustainability metrics, generate reports, and ensure compliance with frameworks.

vendors.name: Aqverium
vendors.description: Smart water solutions company with focus on digital water infrastructure, leakage prevention, and sustainable municipal systems.

vendors.name: Causal Dynamics
vendors.description: AI-driven platform providing predictive analytics for energy usage, emissions reduction, and sustainability optimization.
